ygData.subject: Re: A newbie SK has A few questions
ygData.msgSnippet: The problem of avoiding check points is easy.  The problem is, what are you going to do when you get there?  No merchants will sell to you and most will KOS.
ygData.messageBody:
The problem of avoiding check points is easy. The problem is, what are you going to do when you get there? No merchants will sell to you and most will KOS.

Phalisha
Knight of the Shadows, E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeremy [SMTP:spirit@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:19 PM
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] A newbie SK has A few questions

Traveling to Faydwer at level 5 is suicide. You are KOS in every city there, and evading the first 2 guards at the docks is simple enough, but Butcherblock has several guardposts.
----- Original Message -----
From: Don Bickner
To: eqshadowknights
Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 5:43 PM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] A newbie SK has A few questions


Hello all,
I have just created a DE SK and have a few questions.

1) Is there any place near freeport that i can buy food? I have found the Swashbuckler that will buy my loot but he sells no food.I find it degrading to ask the freeport residents to buy food and water for me.

2) What is the method of getting on the boat and over to faydwer? I have spent all my leveling Killing orc pawns in the commons so All the guards that I can see at the gates will con me dubiously, but I have been afraid to enter(I am only level 5). Will all the guards in FP area regard me dubiously? And if I do make it over to BB, how do I elude the guards over near the docks of BB?

Thank you
<< File: ATT00004.html >>
